dublin_core.dcvalue: We have developed an animated PDA based advisor that can engage sedentary adults in dialogues about their physical activity throughout the day An integrated accelerometer enables the advisor to initiate interactions and provide real time feedback Results of preliminary usability testing of interaction modalities are presented and a planned efficacy study using free living sedentary adults is described
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
A handheld animated advisor for physical activity promotion.
